TypeSignature.Value: public class Button : System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl, System.Web.UI.IPostBackEventHandler, System.Web.UI.WebControls.IButtonControl
.class public auto ansi beforefieldinit Button extends System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl implements class System.Web.UI.IPostBackEventHandler, class System.Web.UI.WebControls.IButtonControl
Public Class Button Inherits WebControl Implements IButtonControl, IPostBackEventHandler
public ref class Button : System::Web::UI::WebControls::WebControl, System::Web::UI::IPostBackEventHandler, System::Web::UI::WebControls::IButtonControl

summary.span: 在网页上显示按钮控件。

span.span: Displays a push button control on the Web page.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 本主题内容：In this topic: - [介绍Introduction](#Introduction) - [按钮的回发行为和服务器事件Button Postback Behavior and Server Events](#ButtonPostbackBehaviorandServerEvents) - [客户端脚本中的处理按钮事件Handling Button Events in Client Script](#HandlingButtonEventsinClientScript) - [按钮控件和验证Button Controls and Validation](#ButtonControlsAndValidation) - [数据控件中的按钮Buttons in Data Controls](#ButtonsInDataControls) - [数据绑定到控件Binding Data to the Controls](#BindingDataToTheControls) - [使用带有 UpdatePanel 控件按钮Using Buttons with UpdatePanel Controls](#UsingButtonsWithUpdatePanelControls) - [声明性语法Declarative Syntax](#DeclarativeSyntax) ## 介绍Introduction 使用控件使用户能够发布到服务器的页面的 Web 页面上创建推送按钮。Use the control to create a push button on the Web page that lets users to post a page to the server. 控件触发可以处理以响应回发的服务器代码中的事件。The control triggers an event in server code that you can handle to respond to the postback. 它还可能会引发发页面或，可以运行，并随后取消页面提交的之前可以处理的客户端脚本中的事件。It can also raise an event in client script that you can handle before the page is posted or that can run and then cancel submission of the page. > [!NOTE] > ASP.NET 包括多种类型的按钮控件，其中每个在网页以不同方式显示。ASP.NET includes several kinds of button controls, each of which appears differently on Web pages. 它们是控件，将呈现为一个下压按钮;控件，将呈现为链接; 与控件，将呈现为图像; 与控件，可以创建具有热点的图形，该控件可以单击了用户。They are the control, which renders as a push button; the control, which renders as a link; and the control, which renders as an image; and the control, which lets you create a graphic that has hotspots that users can click. 默认情况下，所有按钮控件都提交页面在单击时。By default, all button controls submit the page when clicked. 你还可以使用和控件以创建页上的按钮是可编程的服务器代码中。You can also use the and controls to create buttons on the page that are programmable in server code. 有关 HTML 和 Web 服务器控件之间的差异的详细信息，请参阅[ASP.NET Web 服务器控件概述](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/0d4854a3-6e79-4b7b-a27f-ac57cd9c2a84)。For details about the differences between HTML and Web server controls, see [ASP.NET Web Server Controls Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/0d4854a3-6e79-4b7b-a27f-ac57cd9c2a84). 默认情况下，控件是一个提交按钮。By default, a control is a Submit button. 提交按钮没有命令名称 (通过指定属性) 与关联的按钮以及只需网页回发到服务器的文章。A Submit button does not have a command name (specified by the property) associated with the button and simply posts the Web page back to the server. 你可以提供的事件处理程序事件以编程方式控制的操作执行时单击提交按钮。You can provide an event handler for the event to programmatically control the actions performed when the Submit button is clicked. 命令按钮有与该按钮，如关联的命令名称`Sort`，通过设置属性。A Command button has a command name associated with the button, such as `Sort`, by setting the property. 此选项，可以创建多个在网站上的控件，并以编程方式确定哪些控件被单击。This allows you to create multiple controls on a Web page and programmatically determine which control is clicked. 你还可以使用与命令按钮来提供有关要执行，如的命令的其他信息的属性`Ascending`。You can also use the property with a command button to provide additional information about the command to perform, such as `Ascending`. 你可以提供的事件处理程序事件以编程方式控制的操作执行时单击该命令按钮。You can provide an event handler for the event to programmatically control the actions performed when the Command button is clicked. ## 按钮的回发行为和服务器事件Button Postback Behavior and Server Events 当用户单击任何 Web 服务器控件按钮时，该页是发送到服务器。When a user clicks any Web server control button, the page is sent to the server. 这使得 Web 页后，可以处理，在基于服务器的代码中引发任何挂起的事件。This causes the Web page to be processed and any pending events to be raised in server-based code. 当完成所有页面和控件处理时，页面将呈现自身到浏览器试。When all page and control processing has finished, the page renders itself to the browser again. 该按钮可以引发其自己事件或事件，你可以通过使用基于服务器的代码处理。The buttons can raise their own events or event, which you can handle by using server-based code. 此函数不同于事件在基于客户端的 Web 应用程序中，或传统的 HTML 页中其中一个按钮`onclick`通过在客户端中运行的 JavaScript 事件进行处理。This is different than events in traditional HTML pages or in client-based Web applications, where a button's `onclick` event is handled by using JavaScript that runs in the client. 有关详细信息，请参阅[ASP.NET Web 窗体服务器控件事件模型](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/6304bff7-1b0e-4641-8acb-6d3b0badc4a3)。For more information, see [ASP.NET Web Forms Server Control Event Model](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/6304bff7-1b0e-4641-8acb-6d3b0badc4a3). 当用户单击按钮控件时，页回发到服务器。When users click a button control, the page is posted back to the server. 默认情况下，发回发到自身页面By default, the page is posted back to itself, 你可以配置要发布到另一页的当前页的按钮。You can configure buttons to post the current page to another page. 这可用于创建多页窗体。This can be useful for creating multi-page forms. 有关详细信息，请参阅[跨页发布 ASP.NET Web 窗体中](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/fedf234e-b7c4-4644-a9e8-c1c0870b043b)。For details, see [Cross-Page Posting in ASP.NET Web Forms](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/fedf234e-b7c4-4644-a9e8-c1c0870b043b). ## 客户端脚本中的处理按钮事件Handling Button Events in Client Script 按钮控件可能会发出服务器事件和客户端事件。Button controls can raise both server events and client events. 服务器事件发生回发后，并且它们不为页面编写服务器端代码中处理。Server events occur after postback, and they are handled in the server-side code that you write for the page. 客户端事件会在客户端脚本，通常 ECMAScript (JavaScript) 中处理，并引发了然后提交页面。Client events are handled in client script, typically ECMAScript (JavaScript), and are raised before the page is submitted. 通过将客户端事件添加到 ASP.NET 按钮控件，你可以执行任务，例如在提交页上之前, 显示确认对话框，并可能会取消提交。By adding client-side events to ASP.NET button controls, you can perform tasks such as displaying confirmation dialog boxes before submitting the page, and potentially cancel the submission. 有关详细信息，请参阅[客户端脚本中的 ASP.NET Web Pages](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/13edb6b9-2dea-43c6-b8c1-a47207de19aa)和[如何： 响应客户端脚本中的按钮 Web 服务器控件事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/1ab97f0b-1c38-4897-85b0-ac915f6a182b)。For details, see [Client Script in ASP.NET Web Pages](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/13edb6b9-2dea-43c6-b8c1-a47207de19aa) and [How to: Respond to Button Web Server Control Events in Client Script](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/1ab97f0b-1c38-4897-85b0-ac915f6a182b). 你可能还想控件还使用客户端脚本来执行回发 （而不是只需执行 HTTP POST 操作）。You might also want the control to also use client script to perform the postback (instead of simply performing an HTTP POST operation). 这很有用，如果你想要以编程方式操作回发，如将其附加到页面上的其他元素。This can be useful if you want to programmatically manipulate the postback, such as attaching it to other elements on the page. 你可以设置控件的属性`true`导致控件以使用客户端-脚本基于回发。You can set the control's property to `true` to cause the control to use client-script based postback. ## 按钮控件和验证Button Controls and Validation 如果某页包含 ASP.NET 验证控件，默认情况下，单击一个按钮控件导致执行其检查验证程序控件。If a page contains ASP.NET validator controls, by default, clicking a button control causes the validator control to perform its check. 如果客户端验证已启用的验证程序控件，则不会提交页面，验证检查失败时。If client-side validation is enabled for a validator control, the page is not submitted if a validation check has failed. 下表介绍了由使您能够更精确地控制验证过程的按钮控件支持的属性。The following table describes the properties supported by button controls that enable you to control the validation process more precisely. |PropertyProperty|描述Description| |--------------|-----------------| ||指定是否单击按钮还会执行验证检查。Specifies whether clicking the button also performs a validation check. 将此属性设置为`false`以防止验证检查。Set this property to `false` to prevent a validation check.| ||使用此选项可指定在单击该按钮时调用的页上的验证程序。Enables you to specify which validators on the page are called when the button is clicked. 如果不建立了任何验证组，单击按钮会调用所有该页上的验证。If no validation groups are established, a button click calls all of the validators that are on the page.| 有关详细信息，请参阅[在 ASP.NET 网页中验证用户输入](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/4ad3dacb-89e0-4cee-89ac-40a3f2a85461)。For more information, see [Validating User Input in ASP.NET Web Pages](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/4ad3dacb-89e0-4cee-89ac-40a3f2a85461). ## 数据控件中的按钮Buttons in Data Controls 按钮 Web 服务器控件通常用于在数据控件中，如中， ，和列表控件。Button Web server controls are often used in data controls, such as in the , , and list controls. 在这些情况下，您通常不响应直接到按钮单击事件。In those cases, you typically do not respond directly to the button click event. 相反，数据控件中的按钮引发事件特定于数据控件。Instead, a button in a data control raises an event that is specific to the data control. 例如，在控件，一个按钮可能引发控件的而不是引发的事件控件的事件。For example, in the control, a button might raise the control's event instead of raising the control's event. 因为数据绑定列表控件可以包含多个按钮，你可以设置按钮的属性来指定要为该事件的一部分传递的值。Because data-bound list controls can contain many buttons, you can set the button's property to specify a value to pass as part of the event. 你随后可以测试该参数以确定被单击的按钮。You can then test for this argument to see which button was clicked. ## 数据绑定到控件Binding Data to the Controls 你可以在以便控制它们的属性设置，将按钮 Web 服务器控件绑定到数据源动态。You can bind the button Web server controls to a data source in order to control their property settings dynamically. 例如，你可以设置按钮的通过使用数据绑定的属性。For example, you can set a button's property by using data binding. ## 使用带有 UpdatePanel 控件按钮Using Buttons with UpdatePanel Controls 局部页面呈现使可以刷新不进行回发页面的部分。Partial-page rendering makes it possible to refresh portions of a page without a postback. 控件使你将标记为参与局部页面呈现的页的部分。 controls enable you to mark parts of the page that participate in partial-page rendering. 默认情况下，在控件的行为控制，包括控制，是在执行异步回发而不是回发。By default, the behavior of controls inside an control, including controls, is to perform an asynchronous postback instead of a postback. 这将刷新的内容控件从其回发的来源。This refreshes only the contents of the control from which the postback originates. 除了以下场景：内控件控件，你可以使用控制与以下方案中的控件：In addition to the scenario of a control that is inside an control, you can use controls with controls in the following scenarios: - 定义之外的控件控件用作该面板的控件。Defining a control that is outside an control as an control for that panel. 单击按钮时，它执行异步回发，并刷新面板的内容。When the button is clicked, it performs an asynchronous postback and refreshes the contents of the panel. - 定义内控件控件用作面板。Defining a control that is inside an control as a for the panel. 当单击按钮时，它可以执行回发，即使它位于控件。When the button is clicked, it performs a postback even though it is inside an control. 有关更多信息局部页面呈现和使用控件，请参阅[UpdatePanel 控件概述](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/29a2265d-9674-4c19-b70e-e5560ee9689a)和[局部页面呈现概述](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5c12736d-d9e9-464a-9388-3fe0f9f49e49)。For more information about partial-page rendering and using controls, see [UpdatePanel Control Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/29a2265d-9674-4c19-b70e-e5560ee9689a) and [Partial-Page Rendering Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5c12736d-d9e9-464a-9388-3fe0f9f49e49). ## 声明性语法Declarative Syntax ``` ``` ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何创建提交文章 Web 页面回发到服务器内容的控件。The following code example demonstrates how to create a Submit control that posts the Web page content back to the server. [!code-aspx-csharp[Classic Button Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic Button Example/CS/sourcecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[Classic Button Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic Button Example/VB/sourcevb.aspx#1)] 下面的代码示例演示如何创建命令对列表进行排序的控件。The following code example demonstrates how to create a Command control that sorts a list. [!code-aspx-csharp[ButtonCommandNameArgument#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/ButtonCommandNameArgument/CS/buttoncommandnamecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[ButtonCommandNameArgument#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/ButtonCommandNameArgument/VB/buttoncommandnamevb.aspx#1)]

remarks.format: ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何重写方法在自定义服务器控件中，以便文本始终以红色显示。The following code example demonstrates how to override the method in a custom server control, so that the text always displays in red. [!code-aspx-csharp[CustomButtonAddAttributesToRender#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CustomButtonAddAttributesToRender/CS/custombuttonaddattributestorendercs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[CustomButtonAddAttributesToRender#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CustomButtonAddAttributesToRender/VB/custombuttonaddattributestorendervb.aspx#1)] [!code-csharp[CustomButtonAddAttributesToRender#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CustomButtonAddAttributesToRender/CS/custombuttonaddattributestorender.cs#2)] [!code-vb[CustomButtonAddAttributesToRender#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CustomButtonAddAttributesToRender/VB/custombuttonaddattributestorender.vb#2)]

Public Overridable Property CausesValidation As Boolean

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示在单击 控件时是否执行验证。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether validation is performed when the control is clicked.

value.span: 如果在单击 控件后执行验证，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if validation is performed when the control is clicked; otherwise, .
The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 默认情况下，执行页验证时控件被单击。By default, page validation is performed when a control is clicked. 页验证确定输入的控件是否与全部通过指定由验证控件的验证规则页上的验证控件。Page validation determines whether the input controls associated with a validation control on the page all pass the validation rules specified by the validation control. 你可以指定或确定是否在客户端和服务器上执行验证时通过单击控件属性。You can specify or determine whether validation is performed on both the client and the server when a control is clicked by using the property. 若要禁止从正在执行的验证，请设置属性`false`。To prevent validation from being performed, set the property to `false`. > [!NOTE] > 应设置属性`false`使用时属性回发到不同的页。You should set the property to `false` when you are using the property to post back to a different page. 在显式时应该检查验证回发到不同的页。You should explicitly check validation when posting back to a different page. 有关示例，请参阅备注部分的属性。For an example, see the Remarks section of the property. 此属性通常设置为`false`为`reset`或`clear`按钮，以防止在单击该按钮时执行验证。This property is commonly set to `false` for a `reset` or `clear` button to prevent validation from being performed when the button is clicked. 时的值属性设置为`true`，你还可以使用属性来为其指定验证组的名称控件进行验证。When the value of the property is set to `true`, you can also use the property to specify the name of the validation group for which the control causes validation. 无法通过主题或样式表主题设置此属性。This property cannot be set by themes or style sheet themes. 有关详细信息，请参阅和[ASP.NET 主题和皮肤](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5df3ebbd-d46c-4502-9406-02f9df4ef2c3)。For more information, see and [ASP.NET Themes and Skins](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5df3ebbd-d46c-4502-9406-02f9df4ef2c3). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用属性以防止在发生的页验证。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to prevent page validation from occurring. 请注意，方法单独激活每个验证控件。Note that the method activates each validation control independently. > [!IMPORTANT] > 此示例具有一个接受用户输入的文本框，这是一个潜在的安全威胁。This example has a text box that accepts user input, which is a potential security threat. 默认情况下，ASP.NET 网页验证用户输入是否不包含脚本或 HTML 元素。By default, ASP.NET Web pages validate that user input does not include script or HTML elements. 有关详细信息，请参阅[脚本侵入概述](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07)。For more information, see [Script Exploits Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07). [!code-aspx-csharp[ButtonControlCausesValidation#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/ButtonControlCausesValidation/CS/buttoncausesvalidationcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[ButtonControlCausesValidation#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/ButtonControlCausesValidation/VB/buttoncausesvalidationvb.aspx#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: public event EventHandler Click;
.event class System.EventHandler Click
Public Custom Event Click As EventHandler
public: virtual event EventHandler ^ Click;

summary.span: 在单击 控件时发生。

span.span: Occurs when the control is clicked.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 引发事件时控件被单击。The event is raised when the control is clicked. 此事件通常用时与不关联任何命令名称控件 （例如，带有提交按钮）。This event is commonly used when no command name is associated with the control (for instance, with a Submit button). 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何指定和代码的事件处理程序为了在 Web 上显示一条消息的事件时页控件被单击。The following code example demonstrates how to specify and code an event handler for the event in order to display a message on the Web page when the control is clicked. [!code-aspx-csharp[ButtonClickText#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/ButtonClickText/cs/ButtonClickCS.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[ButtonClickText#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/ButtonClickText/vb/ButtonClickVB.aspx#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: public event System.Web.UI.WebControls.CommandEventHandler Command;
.event class System.Web.UI.WebControls.CommandEventHandler Command
Public Custom Event Command As CommandEventHandler
public: virtual event System::Web::UI::WebControls::CommandEventHandler ^ Command;

summary.span: 在单击 控件时发生。

span.span: Occurs when the control is clicked.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 引发事件时控件被单击。The event is raised when the control is clicked. 此事件通常用时的命令名称，如`Sort`，与关联控件。This event is commonly used when a command name, such as `Sort`, is associated with the control. 此选项，可以创建多个在网站上的控件，并以编程方式确定哪些控件被单击。This allows you to create multiple controls on a Web page and programmatically determine which control is clicked. > [!NOTE] > 通过控件层次结构中的窗体中引发事件`BubbleEvent`。The event is raised through the control hierarchy in the form of the `BubbleEvent`. 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[NIB： 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何指定和代码的事件处理程序事件以对列表进行排序时控件被单击。The following code example demonstrates how to specify and code an event handler for the event to sort a list when the control is clicked. 此示例指定事件处理程序以声明方式，使用属性控件。This example specifies the event handler declaratively, using the property of the control. [!code-aspx-csharp[ButtonCommandNameArgument#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/ButtonCommandNameArgument/CS/buttoncommandnamecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[ButtonCommandNameArgument#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/ButtonCommandNameArgument/VB/buttoncommandnamevb.aspx#1)] 下面的代码示例演示如何以编程方式将其添加到中的事件并指定事件处理程序`Page_Load`方法。The following code example demonstrates how to specify the event handler and programmatically add it to the event in the `Page_Load` method. [!code-aspx-csharp[ButtonCommand#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/ButtonCommand/CS/buttoncommandcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[ButtonCommand#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/ButtonCommand/VB/buttoncommandvb.aspx#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: public string CommandArgument { get; set; }
.property instance string CommandArgument
Public Property CommandArgument As String
public: property System::String ^ CommandArgument { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置可选参数，该参数与关联的 一起被传递到 事件。

span.span: Gets or sets an optional parameter passed to the event along with the associated .

value.span: 与关联的 一起被传递到 事件的可选参数。

span.span: An optional parameter passed to the event along with the associated .
The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用属性指定一个参数，补充属性。Use the property to specify a parameter that compliments the property. > [!NOTE] > 虽然可以设置本身的属性，它通常是只使用时也设置属性。Although you can set the property by itself, it is normally only used when the property is also set. 属性补充属性，它允许你提供有关要执行的命令的其他信息。The property complements the property by allowing you to provide additional information about the command to perform. 例如，如果你设置属性`Sort`和属性`Ascending`，指定按升序排序的命令。For example, if you set the property to `Sort` and the property to `Ascending`, you specify a command to sort in ascending order. 无法通过主题或样式表主题设置此属性。This property cannot be set by themes or style sheet themes. 有关详细信息，请参阅和[ASP.NET 主题和皮肤](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5df3ebbd-d46c-4502-9406-02f9df4ef2c3)。For more information, see and [ASP.NET Themes and Skins](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5df3ebbd-d46c-4502-9406-02f9df4ef2c3). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用属性创建列表以升序排序，排序的控件。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to create a control that sorts a list in ascending order. [!code-aspx-csharp[ButtonCommandNameArgument#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/ButtonCommandNameArgument/CS/buttoncommandnamecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[ButtonCommandNameArgument#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/ButtonCommandNameArgument/VB/buttoncommandnamevb.aspx#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: public string CommandName { get; set; }
.property instance string CommandName
Public Property CommandName As String
public: property System::String ^ CommandName { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置命令名，该命令名与传递给 事件的 控件相关联。

span.span: Gets or sets the command name associated with the control that is passed to the event.
The command name of the control.
The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果你具有多个控件在网页上，使用属性可指定或确定的命令名称与每个控件。When you have multiple controls on a Web page, use the property to specify or determine the command name associated with each control. 你可以设置与任何字符串，标识要执行的命令的属性。You can set the property with any string that identifies the command to perform. 然后，可以以编程方式确定的命令名称控件并执行相应的操作。You can then programmatically determine the command name of the control and perform the appropriate actions. 有关该命令的其他信息如`Ascending`，可通过使用指定属性。Additional information about the command, such as `Ascending`, may be specified by using the property. 无法通过主题或样式表主题设置此属性。This property cannot be set by themes or style sheet themes. 有关详细信息，请参阅和[ASP.NET 主题和皮肤](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5df3ebbd-d46c-4502-9406-02f9df4ef2c3)。For more information, see and [ASP.NET Themes and Skins](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5df3ebbd-d46c-4502-9406-02f9df4ef2c3). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用属性创建对列表进行排序的控件。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to create a control that sorts a list. [!code-aspx-csharp[ButtonCommandNameArgument#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/ButtonCommandNameArgument/CS/buttoncommandnamecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[ButtonCommandNameArgument#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/ButtonCommandNameArgument/VB/buttoncommandnamevb.aspx#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: protected virtual System.Web.UI.PostBackOptions GetPostBackOptions ();

Protected Overridable Function GetPostBackOptions () As PostBackOptions
protected: virtual System::Web::UI::PostBackOptions ^ GetPostBackOptions();

summary.span: 创建表示 控件的回发行为的 对象。

span.span: Creates a object that represents the control's postback behavior.

returns.span: 一个表示 控件的回发行为的 。

span.span: A that represents the control's postback behavior.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法创建对象，表示控件的回发行为。The method creates a object that represents the control's postback behavior. 对象通常然后传递给方法，用于获取对客户端脚本函数的引用，调用时，会导致页回发到服务器。The object is then typically passed to the method, which is used to obtain a reference to a client-side script function that, when invoked, causes the server to post back to the page. 此方法主要由控件开发人员扩展时使用类。This method is used primarily by control developers when extending the class.

para.span: 您可以重写在派生类来修改按钮控件的回发选项，或单击该按钮时调用客户端脚本中的方法。

span.span: You can override the method in your derived class to modify the postback options for the button control, or to call client-side script when the button is clicked.

para.span: 一定要调用基类的方法，以便这些标准的回发选项进行设置。

span.span: Be sure to call the base class's method so that the standard postback options are set.

MemberSignature.Value: protected virtual void OnClick (EventArgs e);
.method familyhidebysig newslot virtual instance void OnClick(class System.EventArgs e) cil managed
Protected Overridable Sub OnClick (e As EventArgs)
protected: virtual void OnClick(EventArgs ^ e);

span.span: The event data.

summary.span: 引发 控件的 事件。

span.span: Raises the event of the control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 引发事件时控件被单击。The event is raised when the control is clicked. 此事件通常用时与不关联任何命令名称控件 （例如，带有提交按钮）。This event is commonly used when no command name is associated with the control (for instance, with a Submit button). 引发事件时，将通过委托调用事件处理程序。Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate. 有关详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). 方法还允许派生类对事件进行处理而不必附加委托。The method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate. 这是在派生类中处理事件的首选技术。This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何指定和代码的事件处理程序为了在网页上显示一个简单消息的事件。The following code example demonstrates how to specify and code an event handler for the event in order to display a simple message on the Web page. [!code-aspx-csharp[ButtonClickText#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/ButtonClickText/cs/ButtonClickCS.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[ButtonClickText#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/ButtonClickText/vb/ButtonClickVB.aspx#1)]

para.span: 在派生类中重写 时，一定要调用基类的 方法，以便已注册的委托对事件进行接收。

span.span: When overriding in a derived class, be sure to call the base class's method so that registered delegates receive the event.

MemberSignature.Value: public virtual string OnClientClick { get; set; }
.property instance string OnClientClick
Public Overridable Property OnClientClick As String
public: virtual property System::String ^ OnClientClick { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置在引发某个 控件的 事件时所执行的客户端脚本。

span.span: Gets or sets the client-side script that executes when a control's event is raised.

value.span: 在引发某个 控件的 事件时所执行的客户端脚本。

span.span: The client-side script that executes when a control's event is raised.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用属性来指定时，会执行的其他客户端脚本控件的引发事件。Use the property to specify additional client-side script that executes when a control's event is raised. 为此属性呈现在指定的脚本控件的`OnClick`属性除了控件的预定义的客户端脚本。The script that you specify for this property is rendered in the control's `OnClick` attribute in addition to the control's predefined client-side script. 无法通过主题或样式表主题设置此属性。This property cannot be set by themes or style sheet themes. 有关详细信息，请参阅和[ASP.NET 主题和皮肤](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5df3ebbd-d46c-4502-9406-02f9df4ef2c3)。For more information, see and [ASP.NET Themes and Skins](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5df3ebbd-d46c-4502-9406-02f9df4ef2c3). ## Examples Visual Studio Web 站点项目与源代码是可用本主题可以附带：[下载](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=192871)。A Visual Studio Web site project with source code is available to accompany this topic: [Download](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=192871). 下面的代码示例演示如何使用属性来指定时，会执行的其他客户端脚本控件被单击。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to specify additional client-side script that executes when a control is clicked. [!code-aspx-csharp[Button.OnClientClick#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Button.OnClientClick/cs/button.onclientclickcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[Button.OnClientClick#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Button.OnClientClick/vb/button.onclientclickvb.aspx#1)]

protected: virtual void OnCommand(System::Web::UI::WebControls::CommandEventArgs ^ e);

span.span: The event data.

summary.span: 引发 控件的 事件。

span.span: Raises the event of the control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 引发事件时控件被单击。The event is raised when the control is clicked. 此事件通常用时的命令名称，如`Sort`，与关联控件。This event is commonly used when a command name, such as `Sort`, is associated with the control. 此选项，可以创建多个在网站上的控件，并以编程方式确定哪些控件被单击。This allows you to create multiple controls on a Web page and programmatically determine which control is clicked. > [!NOTE] > 通过控件层次结构中的窗体中引发事件`BubbleEvent`。The event is raised through the control hierarchy in the form of the `BubbleEvent`. 引发事件时，将通过委托调用事件处理程序。Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate. 有关详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). 方法还允许派生类对事件进行处理而不必附加委托。The method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate. 这是在派生类中处理事件的首选技术。This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何指定和代码的事件处理程序事件以对列表进行排序时控件被单击。The following code example demonstrates how to specify and code an event handler for the event to sort a list when the control is clicked. 此示例指定事件处理程序以声明方式，使用属性控件。This example specifies the event handler declaratively, using the property of the control. [!code-aspx-csharp[ButtonCommandNameArgument#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/ButtonCommandNameArgument/CS/buttoncommandnamecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[ButtonCommandNameArgument#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/ButtonCommandNameArgument/VB/buttoncommandnamevb.aspx#1)] 下面的代码示例演示如何以编程方式将其添加到中的事件并指定事件处理程序`Page_Load`方法。The following code example demonstrates how to specify the event handler and programmatically add it to the event in the `Page_Load` method. [!code-aspx-csharp[ButtonCommand#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/ButtonCommand/CS/buttoncommandcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[ButtonCommand#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/ButtonCommand/VB/buttoncommandvb.aspx#1)]

span.span: The event data.

summary.span: 确定按钮在客户端上呈现之前是否已被单击。

span.span: Determines whether the button has been clicked prior to rendering on the client.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 派生从自定义类时，主要由控件开发人员使用方法控件。The method is used primarily by control developers when deriving a custom class from the control.

MemberSignature.Value: public virtual string PostBackUrl { get; set; }
.property instance string PostBackUrl
Public Overridable Property PostBackUrl As String
public: virtual property System::String ^ PostBackUrl { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置单击 控件时从当前页发送到的网页的 URL。

span.span: Gets or sets the URL of the page to post to from the current page when the control is clicked.

value.span: 单击 控件时从当前页发送到的网页的 URL。

span.span: The URL of the Web page to post to from the current page when the control is clicked.

value.span: 默认值为空字符串 ("")，表示将页回发到自身。

span.span: The default value is an empty string (""), which causes the page to post back to itself.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性允许你执行跨页面 post 使用控件。The property allows you to perform a cross-page post using the control. > [!NOTE] > 只有正确指定的路径使用此属性。Only correctly specified paths work with this property. 例如，相对路径 (Test/default.aspx) 绝对路径 (https://localhost/WebApp/default.aspx)和虚拟 (~ \Test\default.aspx) 正常工作。For example, relative paths (Test/default.aspx), absolute paths (https://localhost/WebApp/default.aspx) and virtual (~\Test\default.aspx) work correctly. 如不正确路径"/ Test/default.aspx"或"\Test\default.aspx"不起作用。Incorrectly formed paths such as "/Test/default.aspx" or "\Test\default.aspx" do not work. 请参阅[ASP.NET Web 项目路径](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/2447f50c-b849-483c-8093-85ed53e7a5bd)有关创建正确的路径的讨论。See [ASP.NET Web Project Paths](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/2447f50c-b849-483c-8093-85ed53e7a5bd) for a discussion on creating correct paths. 设置属性时要发送到 Web 页的 url控件被单击。Set the property to the URL of the Web page to post to when the control is clicked. 例如，指定`Page2.aspx`导致包含的页控件来发送到`Page2.aspx`。For example, specifying `Page2.aspx` causes the page that contains the control to post to `Page2.aspx`. 如果未指定的值属性，在页发回发到自身。If you do not specify a value for the property, the page posts back to itself. > [!IMPORTANT] > 在执行与服务器端验证的控件与跨页回发时，你应检查页的属性是`true`之前处理回发。When performing a cross-page postback with controls with server-side validation, you should check that the page's property is `true` before processing the postback. 对于跨页回发，页面以检查是。In the case of a cross-page postback, the page to check is the . 下面的 VB 代码演示如何做到这一点：The following VB code shows how this is done: ``` Sub Page_Load(ByVal sender As Object, ByVal e As System.EventArgs) Handles Me.Load If Page.PreviousPage.IsValid Then ' Handle the post back Else Response.Write("Invalid") End If End Sub ``` 有关跨页发送技术的详细信息，请参阅[跨页发布 ASP.NET Web 窗体中](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/fedf234e-b7c4-4644-a9e8-c1c0870b043b)。For more information on cross-page posting techniques, see [Cross-Page Posting in ASP.NET Web Forms](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/fedf234e-b7c4-4644-a9e8-c1c0870b043b). 无法通过主题或样式表主题设置此属性。This property cannot be set by themes or style sheet themes. 有关详细信息，请参阅和[ASP.NET 主题和皮肤](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5df3ebbd-d46c-4502-9406-02f9df4ef2c3)。For more information, see and [ASP.NET Themes and Skins](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5df3ebbd-d46c-4502-9406-02f9df4ef2c3). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用属性来执行跨页 post。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to perform a cross-page post. 当用户单击控件，在页发到指定的目标页的文本框中输入的值属性。When the user clicks the control, the page posts the value entered in the text box to the target page specified by the property. 若要运行此示例，你还必须在此代码示例所在的目录中创建目标页的文件。To run this sample, you must also create a file for the target page in the same directory as this code example. 目标页的代码是下一步的示例中提供的。The code for target page is provided in the next example. [!code-aspx-csharp[Button.PostBackUrlProperty#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Button.PostBackUrlProperty/CS/button.postbackurlpropertycs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[Button.PostBackUrlProperty#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Button.PostBackUrlProperty/VB/button.postbackurlpropertyvb.aspx#1)] 下面的代码示例演示如何使用属性来访问从另一个页使用的一个值，已发布属性。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to access a value that was posted from another page using the property. 此页获取已发布从前一页，并将其显示给用户的字符串。This page gets the string that was posted from the previous page and displays it to the user. 如果你尝试直接运行此代码示例，则将会出错，因为值`text`字段将为`null`。If you attempt to run this code example directly, you will get an error because the value of the `text` field will be `null`. 相反，使用此代码创建一个目标页面并将该文件放在与上一示例的代码相同的目录。Instead, use this code to create a target page and place the file in the same directory as the code for the previous example. 文件的名称必须对应于指定的值上一示例中的属性。The name of the file must correspond to the value specified for the property in the previous example. 当你运行上一示例的代码时，此页将在发生跨页发送时自动执行。When you run the code for the previous example, this page will execute automatically when the cross page post occurs. > [!IMPORTANT] > 此示例具有一个接受用户输入的文本框，这是一个潜在的安全威胁。This example has a text box that accepts user input, which is a potential security threat. 默认情况下，ASP.NET 网页验证用户输入是否不包含脚本或 HTML 元素。By default, ASP.NET Web pages validate that user input does not include script or HTML elements. 有关详细信息，请参阅[脚本侵入概述](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07)。For more information, see [Script Exploits Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07). [!code-aspx-csharp[Button.PostBackUrlPage2#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Button.PostBackUrlPage2/CS/button.postbackurlpage2cs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[Button.PostBackUrlPage2#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Button.PostBackUrlPage2/VB/button.postbackurlpage2vb.aspx#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: protected virtual void RaisePostBackEvent (string eventArgument);
.method familyhidebysig newslot virtual instance void RaisePostBackEvent(string eventArgument) cil managed
Protected Overridable Sub RaisePostBackEvent (eventArgument As String)
protected: virtual void RaisePostBackEvent(System::String ^ eventArgument);

span.span: The argument for the event.

summary.span: 当 控件回发到服务器时引发此控件的事件。

span.span: Raises events for the control when it posts back to the server.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 内部使用此事件控件，它被单击时，引发事件，并定义，如果事件。This event is used internally by the control, when it is clicked, to raise a event, and if defined, a event.

MemberSignature.Value: protected internal override void RenderContents (System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter writer);

Protected Friend Overrides Sub RenderContents (writer As HtmlTextWriter)
protected public: override void RenderContents(System::Web::UI::HtmlTextWriter ^ writer);

param.name: writer
param.span: 对象，表示要在客户端呈现 HTML 内容的输出流。

span.span: A object that represents the output stream to render HTML content on the client.

summary.span: 将控件的内容呈现到指定的编写器中。

span.span: Renders the contents of the control to the specified writer.

remarks.format: ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何重写方法中的自定义的服务器控件，以便它始终显示以下自定义的文本服务器控件。The following code example demonstrates how to override the method in a custom server control so that it always displays text following a custom server control. [!code-aspx-csharp[CustomButtonRenderContents#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CustomButtonRenderContents/CS/custombuttonrendercontentscs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[CustomButtonRenderContents#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CustomButtonRenderContents/VB/custombuttonrendercontentsvb.aspx#1)] [!code-csharp[CustomButtonRenderContents#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CustomButtonRenderContents/CS/custombuttonrendercontents.cs#2)] [!code-vb[CustomButtonRenderContents#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CustomButtonRenderContents/VB/custombuttonrendercontents.vb#2)]

virtual void System.Web.UI.IPostBackEventHandler.RaisePostBackEvent(System::String ^ eventArgument) = System::Web::UI::IPostBackEventHandler::RaisePostBackEvent;

span.span: The argument for the event.

summary.span: 当 控件回发到服务器时引发此控件的事件。

span.span: Raises events for the control when it posts back to the server.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 内部使用此事件控件，它被单击时，引发事件，并定义，如果事件。This event is used internally by the control, when it is clicked, to raise a event, and if defined, a event. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何重写方法，以便它始终引发中自定义事件控件。The following code example demonstrates how to override the method so that it always raises the event in a custom control. [!code-csharp[CustomButtonRaisePostBackEvent#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CustomButtonRaisePostBackEvent/CS/custombuttonraisepostbackevent.cs#2)] [!code-vb[CustomButtonRaisePostBackEvent#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CustomButtonRaisePostBackEvent/VB/custombuttonraisepostbackevent.vb#2)]

Public Property Text As String
public: property System::String ^ Text { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置在 控件中显示的文本标题。

span.span: Gets or sets the text caption displayed in the control.

value.span: 在 控件中显示的文本标题。

span.span: The text caption displayed in the control.
The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用属性指定或确定要在中显示的标题控件。Use the property to specify or determine the caption to display in the control. 此属性的值设置时，可以自动保存到的资源文件通过使用设计器工具。The value of this property, when set, can be saved automatically to a resource file by using a designer tool. 有关详细信息，请参阅和[全球化和本地化](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8ef3838e-9d05-4236-9dd0-ceecff9df80d)。For more information, see and [Globalization and Localization](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8ef3838e-9d05-4236-9dd0-ceecff9df80d). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用属性来指定中显示的标题控件。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to specify the caption displayed in the control. [!code-aspx-csharp[ButtonClickText#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/ButtonClickText/cs/ButtonClickCS.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[ButtonClickText#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/ButtonClickText/vb/ButtonClickVB.aspx#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: public virtual bool UseSubmitBehavior { get; set; }
.property instance bool UseSubmitBehavior
Public Overridable Property UseSubmitBehavior As Boolean
public: virtual property bool UseSubmitBehavior { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置一个布尔值，该值指示 控件使用客户端浏览器的提交机制还是 ASP.NET 回发机制。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the control uses the client browser's submit mechanism or the ASP.NET postback mechanism.

value.span: 如果该控件使用了客户端浏览器的提交机制，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the control uses the client browser's submit mechanism; otherwise, .
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用属性指定是否控件使用客户端浏览器的提交机制还是 ASP.NET 回发机制。Use the property to specify whether a control uses the client browser's submit mechanism or the ASP.NET postback mechanism. 默认情况下此属性的值是`true`，从而导致控件以使用浏览器的提交机制。By default the value of this property is `true`, causing the control to use the browser's submit mechanism. 如果指定`false`，ASP.NET 页框架会将客户端脚本添加到页后，可以窗体发布到服务器。If you specify `false`, the ASP.NET page framework adds client-side script to the page to post the form to the server. 当属性是`false`，控件开发人员可以使用方法以返回客户端回发事件。When the property is `false`, control developers can use the method to return the client postback event for the . 返回的字符串方法包含客户端函数调用的文本和可以插入到客户端事件处理程序。The string returned by the method contains the text of the client-side function call and can be inserted into a client-side event handler. 无法通过主题或样式表主题设置此属性。This property cannot be set by themes or style sheet themes. 有关详细信息，请参阅和[ASP.NET 主题和皮肤](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5df3ebbd-d46c-4502-9406-02f9df4ef2c3)。For more information, see and [ASP.NET Themes and Skins](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5df3ebbd-d46c-4502-9406-02f9df4ef2c3). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用属性指定的提交机制，控件回发到服务器时使用。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to specify the submit mechanism that a control uses when it posts back to the server. 属性设置为`false`，从而导致该按钮以使用 ASP.NET 回发的机制。The property is set to `false`, causing the button to use the ASP.NET postback mechanism. 如果您查看所呈现的页面上，使用你的浏览器查看源命令的源代码，你将看到客户端脚本，已添加由 ASP.NET 页框架窗体发布到服务器。If you view the source code for the rendered page using your browser's View Source command, you will see that client-side script has been added by the ASP.NET page framework to post the form to the server. [!code-aspx-csharp[Button.UseSubmitBehavior#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Button.UseSubmitBehavior/CS/button.usesubmitbehaviorcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[Button.UseSubmitBehavior#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Button.UseSubmitBehavior/VB/button.usesubmitbehaviorvb.aspx#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: public virtual string ValidationGroup { get; set; }
.property instance string ValidationGroup
Public Overridable Property ValidationGroup As String
public: virtual property System::String ^ ValidationGroup { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置在 控件回发到服务器时导致验证的控件组。

span.span: Gets or sets the group of controls for which the control causes validation when it posts back to the server.

value.span: 在 控件回发到服务器时导致验证的控件组。

span.span: The group of controls for which the control causes validation when it posts back to the server.
The default value is an empty string ("").

remarks.format: ## Remarks 验证组允许您将在页面上的验证控件分配给特定类别。Validation groups allow you to assign validation controls on a page to a specific category. 每个验证组都可以独立于其他页上的验证组进行验证。Each validation group can be validated independently of other validation groups on the page. 使用属性来为其指定验证组的名称控件回发到服务器时要进行验证。Use the property to specify the name of the validation group for which the control causes validation when it posts back to the server. 此属性才起作用时，才的值属性设置为`true`。This property has an effect only when the value of the property is set to `true`. 当指定的值属性，只会验证控件且是指定组的一部分时验证控件回发到服务器。When you specify a value for the property, only the validation controls that are part of the specified group are validated when the control posts back to the server. 如果未指定此属性的值与属性设置为`true`，该控件发回发到服务器时，该页上未分配给验证组的所有验证控件进行都验证。If you do not specify a value for this property and the property is set to `true`, all validation controls on the page that are not assigned to a validation group are validated when the control posts back to the server. 无法通过主题或样式表主题设置此属性。This property cannot be set by themes or style sheet themes. 有关详细信息，请参阅和[ASP.NET 主题和皮肤](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5df3ebbd-d46c-4502-9406-02f9df4ef2c3)。For more information, see and [ASP.NET Themes and Skins](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5df3ebbd-d46c-4502-9406-02f9df4ef2c3). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用属性来指定要验证时的控件控件回发到服务器。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to specify the controls to validate when a control posts back to the server. 页面包含用于捕获从用户的数据的三个文本框和三个控件以确保用户未将一个文本框留空。The page contains three text boxes to capture data from the user and three controls to ensure that the user does not leave a text box blank. 控制中的前两个文本框中为`PersonalInfoGroup`验证组和控件中的第三个文本框是`LocationInfoGroup`验证组。The controls for the first two text boxes are in the `PersonalInfoGroup` validation group and the control for the third text box is in the `LocationInfoGroup` validation group. 当`Button1`单击后，仅验证组中的控件`PersonalInfoGroup`进行验证。When `Button1` is clicked, only the controls in validation group `PersonalInfoGroup` are validated. 当`Button2`单击后，仅验证分组中的控件`LocationInfoGroup`进行验证。When `Button2` is clicked, only the control in validation group `LocationInfoGroup` is validated. > [!IMPORTANT] > 此示例具有一个接受用户输入的文本框，这是一个潜在的安全威胁。This example has a text box that accepts user input, which is a potential security threat. 默认情况下，ASP.NET 网页验证用户输入是否不包含脚本或 HTML 元素。By default, ASP.NET Web pages validate that user input does not include script or HTML elements. 有关详细信息，请参阅[脚本侵入概述](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07)。For more information, see [Script Exploits Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07). [!code-aspx-csharp[Button.ValidationGroup#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Button.ValidationGroup/CS/button.validationgroupcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[Button.ValidationGroup#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Button.ValidationGroup/VB/button.validationgroupvb.aspx#1)]
